title: Hunting for Sport
description: Hunter is a man who has everything, or so he thinks. Money, success, looks, brains, he believes they are all he needs for a happy life. But love? That’s a sucker’s game. Pro athletes fall to his charms, but he never lets any of them get too close.Then life throws him a curve when his best friend, the pitcher for his baseball team The Legends, comes to him for help. Life, he finds, gets complicated when feelings get involved. But he is not one to back down from a challenge.From the author of Wild Horses comes Hunting For Sport-- a story of love, sex, and the murky places of the human heart.Novel 110K words Graphic sex and mild bondage and dominance themes
author: D. River
